name: Google Sheets Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Google Sheets events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Sheets Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Google Sheets events occur

pollTimes.name: pollTimes
pollTimes.description: Time at which polling should occur
pollTimes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Poll Times | 作用: Time at which polling should occur | 默认值: {'item': [{'mode': 'everyMinute'}]}

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: triggerOAuth2

documentId.name: documentId
documentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Document | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

sheetName.name: sheetName
sheetName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sheet | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

event.name: event
event.description: It will be triggered also by newly created columns (if the 'Columns to Watch' option is not set)
event.natural_language_description: 参数名: Trigger On | 作用: It will be triggered also by newly created columns (if the 'Columns to Watch' option is not set) | 默认值: anyUpdate | (必填项)

includeInOutput.name: includeInOutput
includeInOutput.description: This option will be effective only when automatically executing the workflow
includeInOutput.natural_language_description: 参数名: Include in Output | 作用: This option will be effective only when automatically executing the workflow | 默认值: new

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: columnsToWatch (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
valueRender (值: None) - Determines how values will be rendered in the output. More info.
dateTimeRenderOption (值: None) - Determines how dates should be rendered in the output.  More info.
